Submodules¶

dopyr.screamer module¶

dopyr.screamer.maybe_scream(text, do_scream=False)[source]¶

Returns given text input as caps lock text, if do_scream is true.

Parameters:
  • text (str) – Some input text
  • do_scream (bool) – Decide, whether to scream or not
Returns:

May be in caps lock
Return type:

str
